Title: Relates to human-relevant research funding for scientific testing on animals and establishes the promoting ethical testing solutions fund
Summary: Relates to human-relevant research funding for scientific testing on animals to promote human-relevant research alternatives to scientific animal testing and establishes the promoting ethical testing solutions fund.
LawCode: Add ยง504-a, Pub Health L; add ยง99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to human-relevant research funding for scientific testing on animals; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the promoting ethical testing solutions fund
